page.title: 02GORDON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Gordon school was built ten years ago in 1975.There are four classrooms but only three are used that is because there is not enough children.In 1885 the roll of the old Gordon school was 135 today 100 years on there are only 50 children.The school has a large playground which is mostly tarmac with a quite large grass area.The classrooms are quite spacious with small groups of tables dotted around it.There are two wet areas which are shared between the classes.The wet areas are used for art and junk modeling.The school has a large hall.It also has a medium sized dinning room.We have three teachers and some visiting teachers .They teach p.e, music, drama and sewing.The boys do art and craft.Gordon also has a playgroup for pre school chidren.It is run by the parents.
